All Classes

Class Summary
Class Description
Database
This class is responsible for communication with the database.
Game
This class is used to handle the interactions between players and the game in a syncronized way.
Lobby
This class handles the communication with the clients for the Lobby and Game, having a thread for each connected client and using a Socket and a Scanner as input and a PrintWriter as output.
ServerStart
This class is responsible for starting the server and to create a new thread when a client wants to communicate with the server.
It also keeps track of the users that are logged in.
ServerThread
This class handles all the communication with the clients, except the Lobby and Game, using a Socket and ObjectOutputStream and ObjectInputStream.
SqliteHelper
This class is used to manage the connection to the database.
